p: Regardless of regressive efforts by legislators, journalists, and some environmentalists to separate environmental issues from social justice, the reality is that climate change impacts every sector of the economy as well as every facet of our lives. With global emissions still increasing and on track to surpass 1.5 degrees of warming (Wilke 2019), we’ve already reached a point where climate-fueled planetary emergency is the context in which all other public-policy issues exist.
